mutants.code:
def filter_strings(strings, char):
    filtered_strings = list(filter(lambda x: char in x, strings))
    sorted_strings = sorted(filtered_strings, key=len, reverse=False)
    return sorted_strings

mutants.original_line: filtered_strings = list(filter(lambda x: char in x, strings))
mutants.mutated_line: filtered_strings = list(filter(lambda x: char not in x, strings))
mutants.code:
def filter_strings(strings, char):
    filtered_strings = list(filter(lambda x: char not in x, strings))
    sorted_strings = sorted(filtered_strings, key=len, reverse=True)
    return sorted_strings
